summary: This document is a brief email or message referencing a Saturday Night Live (SNL) YouTube video titled 'Weekend Update: The Devil on His Latest Accomplishments' that mentions Jeffrey Epstein. It appears to be a forwarded link or note, possibly from within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the title of a referenced SNL YouTube video alongside 'the devil' and 'the prince'.

events.title: SNL Video Reference
events.description: An SNL YouTube video titled 'Weekend Update: The Devil on His Latest Accomplishments' is referenced, mentioning Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document references a Saturday Night Live (SNL) YouTube video from October 25, 2021, that mentions Jeffrey Epstein.
The video's title links Jeffrey Epstein to figures described as 'the devil' and 'the prince' in a satirical context.
The document identifier (EFTA00088758) and reference to the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY suggest this may be an internal or collected piece of correspondence within the legal case files.
